interfaces jsps, custom tags, and used jstl tag lib. developed java classes for handling functions. developed controller classes struts and tiles api. involved in documentation and use case uml modeling include of class diagrams, sequence diagrams, and use case transaction diagrams. participated in and code reviews developed user interface ajax in jsp and client-side validation developed junit test cases for all the modules. used svn as version environment: java, j2ee, jsp, struts 1.x, jndi, db2, html, xml, dom, sax, ant, ajax, rational rose, eclipse indigo 3.5, soap, apache tomcat, oracle 10g, log4j, svn.
